About.Name: Jazmin Chavez
About.AboutText: Hello, I am a third-year Computer Science student with a minor in Communications at Seattle Pacific University. My interests extend to utilizing technology in addressing critical societal issues. I am particularly passionate about leveraging technology for anti-trafficking initiatives and forensic science applications. Currently, I am actively seeking a summer 2024 internship related to anti-trafficking technology solutions. I am excited about the potential to contribute meaningful projects and make a positive impact. If you have insights, job opportunities, or wish to connect and discuss how we can have influence through technology, please feel free to contact me.

Project1.Title: System Proposal & System Specification
Project1.Desc: This is a comprehensive document that outlines SilentSignal's objectives, requirements, functionalities, and design. It also includes a structured collection of information that embodies the requirements of SilentSignal, a mobile application.

Project2.Title: Task Manager
Project2.Desc: This is a do to list task manager.

Project3.Title: C++ Certification
Project3.Desc: This certification validates my ability to complete coding tasks focused on the foundational elements of C++, including the use of the standard library, preprocessor directives, and object-oriented programming principles. It demonstrates my proficiency in core C++ concepts and readiness for professional programming challenges.
